name: Whitehouse
description: '''Whitehouse''' were an English [[noise music]] band formed in 1980. The group is largely credited for the founding of the [[Power electronics (music)|power electronics genre]]. Whitehouse was founded by vocalist William Bennett and ended as a duo consisting of Bennett and electronics player [[Philip Best]]; however, the group is perhaps best recognized for their 20-year tenure as a three-piece with synth player [[Peter Sotos]], who joined the band in 1983 and left in 2003.
